Marissa-Ellen Patterson
=======================

**Current Term: November 2025 - November 2028**
Email Marissa-Ellen Patterson:
[mepatterson@cibolotx.gov](mailto:mepatterson@cibolotx.gov)

Marissa-Ellen Patterson was elected to the Cibolo City Council in December 2025 and is honored to serve as the Place 3 Councilwoman. She is committed to
![Marissa-Ellen Patterson](https://www.cibolotx.gov/Temp%202025MarissaEllenPatterson_Headshot.jpg?t=202601221250250)
advancing smart growth, public safety, fostering innovation, and championing transparent, community-centered governance.

Marissa-Ellen brings a strategic and analytical perspective to city leadership through her work as an Operations Research Analyst. In this role, she supports enterprise-level decision-making by applying data analytics, artificial intelligence, and process optimization to improve operational effectiveness, resource alignment, and organizational performance. Her experience also includes contributing to policy development, helping shape guidance that improves processes, readiness, and mission effectiveness. She is a certified Project Management Professional (PMP) with experience leading complex, high-impact initiatives that strengthen organizational effectiveness.

A proud military child and military spouse, Marissa-Ellen and her family chose to retire in Cibolo, laying down roots in the community they now happily call home. She has been married for 20 years and is a mom to two children, ages 18 and 17.

Outside of public service, Marissa-Ellen enjoys traveling, cooking, and spending time with family and friends. She is committed to serving the residents of Cibolo with integrity, dedication, transparency, and a focus on the city’s growth and quality of life.
